channel.title: Civilization Games/RTS $50
channel.description: So I was looking to get a civilization game or some type of real time strategy for $50 or less. Anybody here have some good reviews on some types of these games, or experiences? Is Napoleon: Total War any good? I've had the whole series and liked everything except the MTW series.

item.title: Civilization Games/RTS $50
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:19, topic:351989”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=448342.msg3300134#msg3300134 date=1281235736]
Starcraft one, right?
[/quote]Yes.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5638152/Starcraft___Brood_War_Expansion.No_cd_required_and_perfect_for_L[/quote]
Already begin downloading another, so I will test it tomorrow.

Read full topic

item.title: Civilization Games/RTS $50
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:16, topic:351989”][quote author=the bank link=topic=448342.msg3300116#msg3300116 date=1281233771]

I can’t get a handle on Starcraft because I’ve always felt its more realistic to build up your base and get defenses up and what not before you start to mass an army and attack.

Whereas in Starcraft you basically right from the start its all about makign as many troops as you can and just sending in wave after wave…

Do you know how its difficulty is compared to AoEIII?
[/quote]Well starcraft doesn’t have adjustable difficulty. Does AoEIII?

Yes, if SC is hard I will try it some time.[/quote]Try it. Campaign is easy…Custom Games are a bitch and a half.

Read full topic

item.title: Civilization Games/RTS $50
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

You can do that on Starcraft 2 if you’re good at distributing resources between building an army to defend yourself while you build up your bases. It may not work on pros, I do sit at base with protoss building up my base while spending loads of resources on taking on more heavy offensive equipment, then once i’m ready ill fill it out with smaller units.

You don’t have to rush in straight away on Starcraft. I usually wait till I have enough to distribute an attack on the enemy and take them out first time around. It works well who waste their time trying to rush from the start.

Read full topic
